title: The Historical Chronicles of Elinor Sturgeon and the Last Human Colony
description: Earth is gone, and seventy-two humans have been saved from dying on a lifeless planet by a species known as the Par. Elinor Sturgeon and her crew are infected with a biological weapon, and now they are expected to fight in an intergalactic war. Elinor must fight for her new found home while trying to figure out the relationship she has formed with her new Par commander, Les. In order to save the galaxy they're going to have to learn to communicate.
author: R.T. Kilgore
